clusters.title: Steam will wind down support for 32-bit Windows as that version of Windows fades

items.title: Steam will wind down support for 32-bit Windows as that version of Windows fades

ai_summary: Valve will discontinue Steam support for 32-bit versions of Windows.

The shift will occur in January 2024, impacting some users.
Valve cited the need to focus on more modern operating systems.
This move allows Valve to allocate resources more efficiently for development.
